22 inline void convertMsg(Eigen::Quaterniond &quat,std_msgs::Float64 &msg)
23 {
24  quat= Eigen::AngleAxisd(0.0, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitX())
25  * Eigen::AngleAxisd(0.0, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitY())
26  * Eigen::AngleAxisd(msg.data, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
27 }

35 inline void convertMsg(Eigen::Quaterniond &quat,geometry_msgs::Transform &msg)
36 {
37  quat=Eigen::Quaterniond(msg.rotation.w,msg.rotation.x,msg.rotation.y,msg.rotation.z);
38 }

46 inline void convertMsg(Eigen::Quaterniond &quat,geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &msg)
47 {
48  convertMsg(quat,msg.transform);
49 }

57 inline void convertMsg(Eigen::Quaterniond &quat,geometry_msgs::Pose &msg)
58 {
59  quat=Eigen::Quaterniond(msg.orientation.w, msg.orientation.x, msg.orientation.y, msg.orientation.z);
60 }

80 inline void convertMsg(Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1> &pose,geometry_msgs::Pose &msg)
81 {
82  pose<< msg.position.x,
83  msg.position.y,
84  msg.position.z,
85  msg.orientation.x,
86  msg.orientation.y,
87  msg.orientation.z,
88  msg.orientation.w;
89  ;
90 }

109 inline void convertMsg(geometry_msgs::Pose &msg,Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1> &pose)
110 {
111  msg.position.x=pose(0);
112  msg.position.y=pose(1);
113  msg.position.z=pose(2);
114  msg.orientation.x=pose(3);
115  msg.orientation.y=pose(4);
116  msg.orientation.z=pose(5);
117  msg.orientation.w=pose(6);
118 }

137 inline void convertMsg(geometry_msgs::Pose &pose,geometry_msgs::Transform &transform)
138 {
139  pose.position.x=transform.translation.x;
140  pose.position.y=transform.translation.y;
141  pose.position.z=transform.translation.z;
142 
143  pose.orientation.x=transform.rotation.x;
144  pose.orientation.y=transform.rotation.y;
145  pose.orientation.z=transform.rotation.z;
146  pose.orientation.w=transform.rotation.w;
147 }
148 
155 inline void convertMsg(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped &pose,geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &transformStamped)
156 {
157  pose.header=transformStamped.header;
158  convertMsg(pose.pose,transformStamped.transform);
159 }

167 inline void convertMsg(Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1> &pose,geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &transformStamped)
168 {
169  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose_msg;
170  convertMsg(pose_msg,transformStamped);
171  convertMsg(pose,pose_msg);
172 }

180 inline void convertMsg(geometry_msgs::Transform &transform,geometry_msgs::Pose &pose)
181 {
182  transform.translation.x=pose.position.x;
183  transform.translation.y=pose.position.y;
184  transform.translation.z=pose.position.z;

Convert an float64 z-axis angle to an eigen quaternion.
